item.title: Emailvision – it's great to feel engaged
item.description: The team at Emailvision have contacted me a lot in the past 3 days - since I wrote a short article on cross channel campaign problems and a lack of testing.

item.title: Starting in Digital? Don't ruin your brand reputation with your 1st social media marketing campaign
item.description: Digital marketing has its benefits mainly that it’s easy to launch a social media campaign without any prior relationship with the victim.
